name: 下海物语/Down To The Sea
name_original: 下海物语/Down To The Sea
description:
欢迎来到下海市，出了在这里生活下去，你还要帮助完成舅舅的心愿。

n

Welcome to Xiahai City, out of living here, you have to help fulfill uncle's wish. Work hard to make money, solve your own food and clothing problem, then make money, invest, recruit younger brothers, and become the handle of this city!
